name: Russet Burbank
description: Russet Burbank is a starchy potato from Netherlands. Popular in cooking for its unique texture and flavor.

name: Yukon Gold
description: Yukon Gold is a waxy potato from Canada. Popular in cooking for its unique texture and flavor.

name: Fingerling
description: Fingerling potatoes are small, waxy, and have a buttery flavor. They are great for roasting or boiling.

name: Red Pontiac
description: Red Pontiac potatoes have red skin and white flesh. They hold shape well and are good for salads and boiling.

name: Kennebec
description: Kennebec potatoes are versatile with white flesh and smooth skin, great for frying and baking.

name: German Blue
description: German Blue potatoes have blue skin and flesh, with a slightly nutty flavor. Good for salads and roasting.

name: French Marquette
description: French Marquette potatoes have red skin and yellow flesh, known for their creamy texture.

name: Red La Soda
description: Red La Soda potatoes have red skin with white flesh, commonly used for boiling and salads.

name: Carola
description: Carola potatoes have yellow flesh and are versatile in cooking, good for boiling and baking.

name: Purple Peruvian
description: Purple Peruvian potatoes have purple skin and flesh, known for their vibrant color and firm texture.
